name: Area-51
description:
Discover the mind-blowing truth about UFO's, Roswell, alien autopsies and more as you blast your way through the U.S. government's most secret and secure military facility: Area 51.

* Unleash destruction with fearsome human and alien weaponry.
* Battle an enemy unlike anything you've ever faced.
* Biological mutations give you alien-enhanced physical abilities.
* Featuring the voices of David Duchovny, Powers Boothe and Marilyn Manson.
* Intense multi-player team battles: 2 player split-screen or multi-player online with up to 16 players.
